mean.mean: 十年，十年期（尤指一个年代）

entry.def: A decade is a period of ten years, especially one that begins with a year ending in 0, for example 1980 to 1989.
entry.tran: 十年，十年期（尤指一个年代)

example.ex: ...the last decade of the nineteenth century.

means.word_mean: 2. the cardinal number that is the sum of nine and one; the base of the decimal system

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (denoting each of ten parts of a literary work): via Old French and late Latin from Greek deka 'ten'. Sense 1 dates from the early 17th cent

sentences.cn: 19 世纪的最后 10 年

sentences.cn: 1629年之后的十年间，大约有九十名知识渊博的牧师来到了马萨诸塞州的教会。除此以外，还有诸如约翰·温斯罗普这样的政治领袖。温斯罗普是一位受过良好教育的绅士，在来波士顿之前曾担任过律师和王室官员。
